summary: Use this API to delete SKUs and sales attributes of corresponding products
description: Use this API to delete SKUs and sales attributes of corresponding products.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/sku/remove')
request.add_api_parameter("payload", "<Request>     <Product>         <ItemId>4911096929</ItemId>         <variation>             <Variation1>                 <name>color family</name>             </Variation1>         </variation>         <Skus>             <Sku>                 <SkuId>20691153083</SkuId>             </Sku>             <Sku>                 <SkuId>20690462002</SkuId>             </Sku>         </Skus>     </Product> </Request>")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/sku/remove')
request.add_api_param('payload', '<Request>     <Product>         <ItemId>4911096929</ItemId>         <variation>             <Variation1>                 <name>color family</name>             </Variation1>         </variation>         <Skus>             <Sku>                 <SkuId>20691153083</SkuId>             </Sku>             <Sku>                 <SkuId>20690462002</SkuId>             </Sku>         </Skus>     </Product> </Request>')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: The request parameter is not formatted correctly, check that you are using the correct format against the RemoveSKU section of the Custom sales attributes documentation.
